title: Ionic Spark when.
body:
Ionic Spark {{item:1043}} 

40% attack speed
450 hp
40 magic resist
150% hp5

Deals 40-240 magic damage per spell cast by enemies in 400 range (from center of character) to the caster.
Cost suggestions im leaning toward 2900cost

replies.body: To what purpose, aside from making ryze players even more sad?

So that fighter champions have a way to fight back when they getting hit with multiple spells hitting them for large chunks of their hp. I tried to put a short range on it to 1 keep it of adcs and require that Fighters keep on their targets to get it to work. An optional damage option for tanks exchanging their durability of something like {{item:3193}} for it.
Probably never, it was an item long since removed from the main game.
